Question: Are there any family plans available with U Mobile?
Answer: Yes, U Mobile offers several family plans that cater to different needs and budgets. Here are some of the plans they offer: Unlimited Family Plan: This plan includes unlimited data, talk, and text for up to 5 lines, with speeds of up to 100 Mbps. The cost starts at RM 698 per month. Pro Plan: This plan offers unlimited data, talk, and text for up to 5 lines, with speeds of up to 300 Mbps. The cost starts at RM 1,498 per month. Premium Plan: This plan includes unlimited data, talk, and text for up to 5 lines, with speeds of up to 500 Mbps. The cost starts at RM 2,498 per month. All of these plans come with additional features such as: International roaming in over 80 countries, Data rollover, Access to over 10,000 Wi-Fi hotspots. It's worth noting that U Mobile also offers a 'Bring Your Own Device' (BYOD) option, which allows users to bring their own phone and plan. This can be a cost-effective option for families who already have their own devices.

Question: What is the U Mobile Prepaid Starter Pack?

Answer.text: The U Mobile Prepaid Starter Pack includes a free SIM card, 10GB data allowance (valid for 30 days), unlimited calls and texts to all networks in Malaysia, free international calls to over 100 countries, and Wi-Fi hotspot access nationwide.
